#Run this code to follow along

```{r}
install.packages("dplr")
library("dplyr")

data1 <- data.frame(ID = 1:2, x1 = c("a1","a2"), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
data2 <- data.frame(ID = 2:3, x1 = c("b1","b2"), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
inner_join(data1, data2, by = "ID")
```


```{r}
left_join(data1, data2, by = "ID")
```

```{r}
right_join(data1, data2, by = "ID")
```

```{r}
full_join(data1, data2, by = "ID")
```

```{r}
semi_join(data1, data2, by = "ID")
```

```{r}
anti_join(data1, data2, by = "ID")
```
